amendment.description: To improve the working relationship between the intelligence community and the National Infrastructure Simulation and Analysis Center.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3860 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3860 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S10351-10358; text: CR S10353) To improve the working relationship between the intelligence community and the National Infrastructure Simulation and Analysis Center.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3860 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3860 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Domenici.
